issue.title: Create stubbed API for FlightSQLClient
issue.body:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12923?focusedCommentId=17464763) by David Li (lidavidm):*
`[~kylep]` `[~rafaeltelles]` is this issue still relevant? (Also ARROW-12925, ARROW-12926)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12923?focusedCommentId=17565494) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
